name: MagicWarlord
description:
It's a game made for "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game" jam (Submissions open from April 11th 2019 at 2:00 AM to Monday at 2:00 AM).

Info game:

You need to defend yourself by making magic spells. The spells are created by elements (fire, water, air, earth, dark, holy, poison, cure). There are some rules in order to create spells, also you can fail the creation of a spell. You can heal yourself if the element of the spell is cure.

So, give it a try and have fun!

Cheers.

Updated into a WEB version.

Resolved a damage bug.
